Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Kenneth Colley (December 7, 1937) is an English actor who portrayed Admiral Firmus Piett in The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Colley is the only actor to play the same Imperial officer in more than one Star Wars film. Another notable role was that of Jesus in Monty Python's the Life of Brian. Colley also planned to reprise his role of Piett for Richard LeParmentier's fan film Motti Now.
